balance.define: Check all your balance amount and transaction history.

transactions.title: Payment Transactions
transactions.define: Default records is today. You can only query historical data within 3 months.

balance_withdraw.title: Withdraw Limit Record
balance_withdraw.define: Only show 1 week records by default

reward.title: My Reward Record
reward.define: Default records is 3 months. You can only query historical data within 1 year.

limits.title: Responsible Gambling
limits.define: View and set limits of deposits, losses and time.

reality_check.title: Reality Check
reality_check.define: You can change your reality check interval Interval is:

active_limits.title: Active Limits
active_limits.define: All of your active limits will show below
active_limits.li_content1: If you have more than one limit in place, the lowest limit will be valid. Example: If you have a limit of 500 a month and 200 a day, you will not be able to deposit more than 200 a day and also no more than 500 a month.
active_limits.li_content2: If you want to reduce your limit, it will be done immediately. However if you wish to increase it, you will need to wait 24 hours for this to take effect. The date of the change in limits will be visible in 'Pending Limits

achievement_quests.title: Achievement Quests
achievement_quests.define: Completed achievement quests to win rewards, don't forget to check your achievements!

grand_Achievement_quests.title: Grand Achievement Quests
grand_Achievement_quests.define: Completed achievement quests to win rewards, don't forget to check your achievements!

transfer_modal.title: Reward Points Transfer
transfer_modal.description: You can transfer back to main account.

options.title: Payment Options
options.define: We ensure your deposits and withdrawals are processed securely and quickly. Payment methods are country specific.We charge no fees however some non EU transfers may be subject to charges applied by processing banks.

withdrawal_methods.title: Withdrawal Methods
withdrawal_methods.define: Here we want our players to enjoy their twinnings the way they want to! That's why we give our players multiple payment types! Please note that all processing times are valid from the moment when we initiate the payout. All payouts are initiated once all the necessary checks have been completed by our payments department.

game_history.title: Game History
game_history.define: Default records is 1 week. You can only query historical data within 1 month.

dialog.new_password_define: Password must be at least 8 characters,at least one digit, one uppercase letter and one lowercase letter.

favorite_games.title: Favorite games
favorite_games.define: Your own personal library of games

my_bonuses.title: My Bonuses
my_bonuses.define: These are the bonuses you currently have active!

in_progress.title: In Progress Activity
in_progress.define: These bonuses are available for you - just click activate if you'd like to take them.

activity_history.title: Activity History
activity_history.define: The preset record provides the bonus history within 1 week, and only display historical data within 3 months at most.

paymentshistory.define: Default records is Today. You can only query historical data within 3 months.

bonusesHistory.title: My Bonuses Record

personal_settings.title: Personal Settings

checkopts.accept_terms: I consent to receive details of special offers, news, promotions and other marketing communications by email and mobile notification. I understand that I can always unsubscribe at any time.

personal_settings.warning: Your personal details and supporting document info must be an exact match.
personal_settings.reminder: Please contact support to update read only fields.
personal_settings.verify_your_email: Please click on the link that has just been sent to your email and continue registration process.
personal_settings.send_verification_link: A verification link has been sent to your email account.
personal_settings.otp_expired: The OTP will be expired in
personal_settings.may_not_be_saved: Changes you made may not be saved.
personal_settings.account_and_security_message: Make your password stronger,or change it if someone else knows it.

kyc_verified.title: Verify Your Identity (KYC)
kyc_verified.define: We need to verify your account for you to be able to make withdrawals.

identity.title: Identity
identity.depiction: Passport, driver's license, or other official document replacing them

identity_back.title: Identity (Back)
identity_back.depiction: Passport, driver's license, or other official document replacing them

selfie_id.title: Selfie & ID
selfie_id.depiction: Your selfie with passport/ID in your hands. It should be a single photo so please make sure both your face and passport info are well recognizable and don't overlap each other.

address.title: Address
address.depiction: Please finish preliminary identity verification first!

verifying: We have received your data and will process it within 3-7days working days.
You will receivee a confirmation e-mail once the verification is complete.
kyc_verified.approved: Your passport / driver's license / official document has been approved.
kyc_verified.rejected: Your document has been rejected. Please reload again . If you have any question, please contact customer service. Thank you.

upload.title: Drag and drop file here or Browse
upload.define: Support formats: PDF, JPG or PNG.

kyc_verified.confirm: We have received your withdrawal request and we will process it for you as soon as possible.

email.content: Email us either through the form or direct at ...

faq.title: FAQ
faq.content: Need Help?Check out our FAQ or contact us by using any of the below options.

account_and_security.title: Account and Security
account_and_security.define: Make your password stronger, or change it if someone else knows it.
account_and_security.change_password_page_define: Password must be at least 8 characters,at least one digit, one uppercase letter and one lowercase letter.
account_and_security.new_password_error1: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain a minimum of one lower case letter, one upper case letter, one number. Passsword can contain special character
account_and_security.new_password_error2: New password must be different from current password.
account_and_security.withdraw_new_password: The current password is incorrect or the new password is invalid
account_and_security.withdraw_new_password_error2: New password must be different from current password.

refer_friend.define: Share The Code With Friend To Get 50 CAD!
